function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid global changes and adaptation of green building rating systems due to COVID-19","Impact":"Impact on building design, usage, and maintenance to prevent the spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Integration of disease mitigation measures into green building design and maintenance practices","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, touchless fixtures, UV-C disinfection, and smart building automation","People":"Architects, engineers, building owners, facility managers, and occupants","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners, facility managers"}]}
